#summary XXXCount(...)
#labels api,1.0

*Category*:

[ModelObjectFunctions Model Object Functions]

*Description*:

Dynamic shortcut method, see [count count()] for more info. Replace `XXX` with the name of an association you have set up through [hasMany hasMany()].

*Examples*:

{{{
<!--- a "hasMany" association from "post" to "comment" is required --->
<cfset aPost = model("post").findByKey(params.postId)>

<cfset amount = aPost.commentCount()>
=
<cfset amount = model("comment").count(where="postId=#params.postId#")>
}}}
